website_summaries.verdict: If you love a rustic look, this tree bark cheese board is perfect for you. Perfect for serving hors d'oeuvres, cheese, and crackers.
pros: Each piece is individually handcrafted, and made from durable acacia wood
cons: Some have said it arrived smaller than the size that is described

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: so my plan was to use this as a wedding cake stand... so I paid extra for the 12-15” diameter. This thing is a fake wooden oval with some plastic pegs hot glued to the bottom that is only 11” across at the longest point. Don’t waste your money, guys. Take it from me.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa ault

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, I was going to use this under my daughters wedding cake. I ordered it on Monday before the wedding knowing it would only take 2 days to get to me. The Item was described as 13' to 15" in diameter and 1 3/4" thick. I opened the package to find a 9 3/4" diameter server and the wood it self is only 1/2 thick and with the feet on the bottom it still only measured 1 1/2" not the 1 3/4" stated in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: it worked fine for the cake
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used this for wedding cake with plan to use as a lazy susan on the table later. it worked fine for the cake, but its doesn't turn as freely as it should, just not the quality of the one my dad made years ago.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: So in love with this.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow. I ordered this for my wedding, I fell in love with on the had at bed bath and beyond, but it was 30 and couldnt see spending that much, so I got this one and didnt expect to like it that much, but i honestly love this one more, it heavy duty, smooth, and very beautiful I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cheese board for the Party
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for there perfect charcuterie board for meats and cheeses and this one did the trick! I'm so happy with how great of quality this item is and especially for a great price too! I got a ton of compliments on it during a holiday party last weekend when I used it. It has plenty of space and I also love that it has little legs so it doesn't sit flat on the table. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Centerpiece spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this, used as the base to my candles in the center of the table
customer_reviews.author: Gail Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product - there is a seal on it but it's a light seal and doesn't detract from the natural beauty of it. As you'd expect, the bark around the outside does flake off - so care will need to be taken when cleaning and storing. The feet of the bottom are the reason I chose this product. However, one of the feet promptly fell off within the first hour of use. We were able to get it back on with some wood glue. However, that's why I've given it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: tdelarme

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous. Need more sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today - very quickly I thought. Nicely packaged, and absolutely no damage. I wasn't sure exactly what to expect, but this is an absolutely beautiful serving piece. The top wood surface is sanded/polished so it's really smooth - I would be comfortable putting cheese or whatever directly on it, knowing I could carefully wash it by hand afterwards without leaving any oily residues. I wish this came in a few different sizes - I would definitely buy a set. Perfect for fall/winter entertaining. I bought it specifically for a fall-themed Sip and See for a new baby, but will also be using it for Thanksgiving and Christmas parties for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jkrider01

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: The tree bark server was just as described! The size is what i ordered, the quality is amazing, ESPECIALLY for the price! I paid 12.99. I would order again if I needed another! This is going to go under my wedding cake, I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wilson

customer_reviews.title: but it's cute and I'm happy with the item
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and just as pictured! Item does NOT spin ( I thought I saw somewhere it did?). It took a little longer than expected to arrive, but it's cute and I'm happy with the item... I just wish it arrived on time for the party. ( Don't trust the "purchase in 2 hours to arrive by Friday!" type phrases, they're not true).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful for such little money! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself but my niece saw it and now she wants one so I'll give her this for Christmas. This is so much bigger than I expected as it's larger than my husband's hand! It's SOLID and HEAVY. There are legs beneath it which allows it to stand instead of resting on the counter or table. I can't thank the seller enough for this item as it goes with our kitchen and will be so nice to serve with when we have guests. Beautiful item!
customer_reviews.author: PiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Super cute platter
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter found a picture on Pinterest for a cake with succulents (made from fondant and icing) which she wanted for her birthday. The cake was pictured on a platter just like this one and when I saw it I had to buy it to place the cake on top. It was perfect for the cake and I'm sure will be great for a variety of other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed withis item. It's badly Faux painted and not real wood slice I also did not know there was a time restriction for returning. The worst thing i have purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Developed Huge Crack after One Use...
customer_reviews.text: This came with a small hairline split and developed into a huge crack right down the middle, within weeks. I oiled it immediately upon receipt, hoping to save it, but after the first use, it was obvious that the crack was deep and it was only going to worsen. It's a really pretty board, heavy and thick, but it's just a matter of time before it completely breaks in half. Very disappointing because i really did like it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first but cracked after first use!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this platter/serving piece. I actually used it for my son’s birthday cake. After I removed the leftover cake there was a huge crack. I was very disappointed because I finally splurged and purchased this serving platter which I’ve wanted for a long time. Not sure why it was defective? I did not drop it and it was only used on my dining room table.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning!! Excellent quality!! Better than I had hoped!! After our event, the manager of the venue asked me where I got them. We had bought them brand new for the event and instead of shipping them home...I sold them mine...and bought more of course!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Who let this pass QC?
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the bark detached in most parts. It was for a rustic wedding cake, sigh.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch for a wedding cake
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter used this to set her wedding cake on. Decorated with white icing and fresh greenery and baby's breath, it was the perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: mamac4

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous trivet that broke and I replaced it with this similar raw edge trivet. I use it on my entry table with have a smaller plant and saucer on top, to protect the table finish. I LOVE it. It's very sturdy and goes with my other decor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O.

customer_reviews.title: awesome! Great for a rustic look
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a plate under my wedding cake.. awesome! Great for a rustic look. Loved it. Gonna use it in my living room now!
customer_reviews.author: tricia Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great display for food and more
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a baby shower to display cupcakes on. Everyone talked about how great it looked for our rustic theme shower. After the shower I now use it in my house as a riser to display flowers or nicknacks on. Smooth surface, too!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheese display or centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these....a couple for me and and a couple for gifts. Love them! The make such a nice presentation for cheese appetizers or even as a base for a centerpiece with a cylinder vase and flowers.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of wood
customer_reviews.text: This platter, serving tray, wood disc, tree slice is AWESOME. I initially bought one from a big box store with no feet on it and it was not as good. The quality from this was nice. The feet are cool to add some height to it. Multiple uses out of this thing. Well above expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie5

customer_reviews.title: Need to adjust the size for this item, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to adjust the size for this item, the one I recieved was only 12"x13" plan to use it as a base for a wedding cake and now none of the wood will show. I understand that the size varies but that's a big difference from the 13-15" that is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Courreges

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wood Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much I ended up buying a second one. Great quality (especially for the price). As other reviewers noted, the size differs stand to stand - The second I ordered ended up being about an inch and a half smaller than the first, but for me that worked out perfectly. Just something to be aware of :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Food looks great on this!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to clean. Made a perfect cheese board, which is what I initially purchased for. Since then, I’ve used it for numerous small bites and appetizers. Guests enjoy it just as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: From what it looks seems to be of good quality. I havent used it yet and will find out once i need to wash the product and wood may chip. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great charcuterie board!
customer_reviews.text: The finish was a little rough, so I sanded and applied several coats of pray-on food grade finish before gifting one and keeping one for myself. It makes a great charcuterie board.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order several of these for baby shower centerpieces. Woodsy, Pooh theme and they worked out great! The possibilities for using these are endless. They all arrived in great condition. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Oblong not round
customer_reviews.text: Nice but oblong and not round. I use as a cheese board and also double a place to elevate my knives off my countertop
customer_reviews.author: Christie Angel

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was worth the money. Nice shape, round. Ive read reviews of other logs from other sellers that the bark came off in shipping. I did not have that issue with this seller and product. Bark stayed on. I will use this as a cake platter for my babies 1st birthday. It was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, and lovely. I purchased to display some special rocks I’ve collected, and it’s perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done. Be careful with termites
customer_reviews.text: This piece of wood was very cute!! Used it for a party, then brought it inside my house as decoration. Only thing is, after a few months. I had termites because of it so I immediately threw it away :(
customer_reviews.author: J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: SO MANY USES!
customer_reviews.text: Like the disc on the bottom so it doesn’t sit too flat. Great to serve appetizers, desserts, etc, looks great as a charger & to display any collection. I have 4 & love them!
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and worked great at the party
customer_reviews.text: We picked this up for a friends engagement party because it went with the woods/nature/outdoor theme. It looks great and is lacquered so it doesn't stain with food spills. I have plans to add hardware to the bottom to turn it into a lazy-Susan next.
customer_reviews.author: It’s me!!!

customer_reviews.title: Rustic vibe !
customer_reviews.text: Loved this piece! The price was perfect but it was a little bigger then expected. Used it as a place to hold my utensils. Definitely gives my kitchen that rustic vibe!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality and it is very sturdy. For the price it is very good and a great gift !! I had been looking for one of these for not a lot of money and it is a great purchase! So glad I bought this, my family loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Customers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Definitely need to be careful with it. The bark around the putter ensue will come off. Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality, we are now using it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was really impressed with this for our wedding cake. We had our smaller cake sit on top of this, and then used sheet cakes to cut and serve. Really great quality, we are now using it in the center of our kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: MTAdams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wood enhanced by the live edge!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a nature/natural themed charcuterie party! The live edge is beautiful and the finish on the piece not only brings out the beauty of the wood, it makes it very easy to wipe off and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshiny Yellow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: This is fully finished and smooth. Really nice! I’m using for my wedding cake stand. I’m very excited to see it come together!
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great for table center piece
customer_reviews.text: Everyone compliments this and asks were I got it, similar ones at say pier one were in the $40's!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth surface for serving foods
customer_reviews.text: We used these as centerpieces at our wedding reception and gave them away as wedding favors; I had to order more because everyone wanted one! They are made very well for the priece! Nice smooth surface for serving foods.
customer_reviews.author: deerhunter

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice serving platter!! Don't let the low price fool you, it's really solid and nicely built.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I had to quickly get back online and make another purchase for more! Extremely versatile in use. Receive many compliments on them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in sizing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in sizing. Stated12 to 15 inch diameter. Just under 12 inches. Unable to use 12 inch cake pans to make cakes, but too large for 9 inch pans.
customer_reviews.author: msmomma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on my kitchen room table to hold all of the "stuff" that accumulates there (napkin holder, salt and pepper shakers, olive oil, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece at a great price. Mine arrived with no cracks or damage. I was happily surprised with its looks and sturdiness. I would wash and dry carefully, maybe treat it with a little olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Dubois

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments on this board
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this board my I get tons of compliments from my guests. Have used it several times and it has held up well. Easy to wash (by hand) and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice we use it as a hot plate to put our hot cast iron on.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Ok value for price paid
customer_reviews.text: OK value for the price. That wood was not as pretty in the grain as the one pictured. There were some black areas in the grain – not very appetizing looking but OK for my use
customer_reviews.author: kathleenk

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I want 50 more of these. Great price and it held my sons birthday cake on it. It looked soooo great with the party theme.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn  Citeno

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. I got it to display a wedding cake and it worked out perfectly. My biggest concern was whether or not it would clean up nicely, but the finish is very smooth and cleaning was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Great for wedding cake
customer_reviews.text: It held like a stone and was beautiful for a 3-layer wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn V.

customer_reviews.title: On my kitchen island permanently
customer_reviews.text: I bout this and keep a candle, bouquet of flowers, and a small candy dish on my kitchen island. I love it! The tiny legs are perfect and provide a more expensive look.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. We used it for our wedding cake stand, and now we use it for part of a centerpiece on our dining room table. It's made really well, and I would recommend or gift this to any of my family or friends.
customer_reviews.author: C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a cake and it exceeded my expectations, worth the price for sure, made a real statement and can be used again
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and multipurpose use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I am using it as a centerpiece staging spot on my table. Looks beautiful with my lantern and flowers on it. And as an additional plus I can use it to serve food at parties as well. I plan on buying another one as an accent piece for my side server table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in the appearance- Coloring or stain of wood seems ...
customer_reviews.text: disappointed in the appearance- Coloring or stain of wood seems a bit off putting. Wish RORO hand carved vendor sold something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woodsy Feel!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I see these elsewhere for a whole lot more. Nice a solid. And it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieD

customer_reviews.title: Very natural and beautiful quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful natural and rustic piece. It’s about the size posted on its description, as I’m sure each one is a bit different. I mean it’s a slice of tree so it’s obviously not perfectly round in measurements. I love it! I can use this in any room I want. Great choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful. Perfect. Just what I needed for a cake base.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to use this as a cutting board. Its beautiful for decor.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Design!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Sturdy and beautiful! It has stabilizers on the bottom which keeps it from slipping or moving around. Perfect for a centerpiece, charcuterie, or other decor.
customer_reviews.author: PWazzy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: good size for dinner parties at home. I dont have much to say. It is exactly what I expected.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what is represented  on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Both items arrived with defects (one has an arrow marked on it and the other has a wood filler) contemplating whether I should return them or keep them, waiting for the 3rd piece to arrive. Not very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Grigor

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece!!! I would definitely buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are both unique and a beautiful color. The bark around the edge is such ...
customer_reviews.text: We use one for our kitchen table for warm platters and one on our counter for specialty snacks. They are both unique and a beautiful color. The bark around the edge is such a neat accent. We love both of ours. Great size for larger pans and platters. Would not recommend cutting cheese or fruits. It is just to serve not a cutting board type.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder _Woman _81

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely fell in love with this. Exceptional quality and fairly priced. Using it as a cake stand for my wedding cake. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! I couldn’t tell from the pic that it had feet so that was a happy surprise! I burned a logo in mine and gifted it for Christmas. It was exactly what my friend wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could request a large one
customer_reviews.text: The description gives you a 2”-3” difference. I wish you could ask the seller to make sure it is on the bigger or smaller size. Luckily mine will fit a 10” cake for a wedding, but it wouldn’t a 12” cake. For the price I am impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stormi Choate

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The picture in the description doesn't do the product justice. This is a beautiful piece at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as expected! Perfect for a Rustic Wedding Cake stand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood slice
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a center piece for my nieces wedding shower and as a center piece display at the reception. It is just beautiful. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Terre Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use a a cake stand for a small wedding cake. Good quality. Also has little feet to help raise it up a little. Should work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz V

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: More beautiful in person. Really impressed with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a stand for our wedding cake, and we’re really happy with it! The wood looks great and the feet really make it sturdy. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Great trivet
customer_reviews.text: We use it as a trivet for our Dutch oven when camping. Looks very rustic. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: It would be a great charcuterie platter
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I wanted it to be---rustic yet with definite charm. It would be a great charcuterie platter, but me, I'm using it for a mouse house. Perfect, and I just bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J. Orofino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I purchased it to display my copper mug set also from Amazon. I've gotten many compliments on both. It's very striking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hunter

customer_reviews.title: For a rustic themed wedding
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my wedding center pieces with candles on top! They were so cute and matched my rustic theme. My guests loved it, they all wanted to take it home. Now that the wedding is over, I use my an extra one as a charcuterie board. My only complaint is that some of the bark on the edges are starting to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable stand perfect for my one year olds cake smash pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Msh

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used these for several Christmas gifts for my neighbors. They worked great for small meat and cheese gifts!
customer_reviews.author: bethybeaty

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you’d think but cute for rustic events
customer_reviews.text: Was buying this to put a cake on but it was to small cute tray and I will use it for something else but not even an 8 inch cake would fit in this.
customer_reviews.author: MMW

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and classy. As soon as I took them out of the box I received a complement. Great product, I just wish that they came in two packs.
customer_reviews.author: Elior Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t count on getting 50
customer_reviews.text: The wood is beautiful on most of the rounds. Some have a black logo like thing on them. Also be aware. I only got 49 rounds and was shorted 29 of the twine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn R. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a cake stand for our sons lumberjack birthday party. I was concerned the frosting would stain it but it wiped clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri'

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking and solidly built!
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a little larger than I thought they would be and the tray isn't round but I am very happy with how it looks and feels. It doesn't look cheap and I love how natural it looks. I plan on using it as a cake stand.
customer_reviews.author: CatKendrick

customer_reviews.title: One time use didn’t last wedding mementos gone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my wedding cake a rustic them worked wonderfully for the cake but wanted to continue using it around the house and brought it back out for an Easter center piece and it had cracked why???? It’s unattractive and unusable now
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perefect for rustic cakes, cheese platters, hors d'oeuvre and so much more. The product is high quality, worth every dollar spent! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! So sturdy and beautifully made! The pictures don’t do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Wohlers

customer_reviews.title: Loved this for my Brie cheese and fig jam appetizer
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for my Brie cheese and fig jam appetizer. Displayed beautiful. I will use this for all types of appetizers, cheese, meat & fruit display.
customer_reviews.author: staci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: I loved it came in time for my guest on Christmas they loved it so much they are also getting one I would buy it again if needed I get so many compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: Ann Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for naked wedding cake and then the gift for the bride and groom to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen “Keri”

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood stand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I am using as a cake stand. It’s perfect for what I’m using it for and in the future will be perfect for a small food display of desserts or meats and cheeses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad there was "feet" on the bottom side to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Glad there was "feet" on the bottom side to protect the surface where we placed them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I used it for my nephew's baby shower. And, will be using it again for other events.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these go for hundreds online. This was AMAZING for the money, such a huge piece of wood and in PRISTENE condition. Very happy, and would definitely recomened to anyone looking for a nice wooden piece.
customer_reviews.author: makeupforever725

customer_reviews.title: The product itself waa beautiful but not what i needed
customer_reviews.text: The product itself waa beautiful but not what i needed. I sent them back and never got my full refund back
customer_reviews.author: MK&DJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Stand
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly level and will fit a 10” Cake base nicely. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cakeview LLC

product_meta.title: Lipper International Acacia Tree Bark Footed Server for Cheese, Crackers, and Hors D'oeuvres, Large
product_meta.description: Size:12"-15" diameterLipper International provides exceptionally valued items for the kitchen, home, office, and child's playroom. Known for their functionality and beauty, each of our products is individually crafted from the finest quality materials. This unique Tree Bark Server is made from durable acacia wood tree bark that provides a rustic look while still being contemporary and functional. Use it to serve cheese, crackers, and hors d'oeuvres. Hand wash with a mild soap and cool water. Do not soak. Do not put in the dishwasher, microwave or refrigerator. Extreme changes in temperature will cause the material to crack over time. Dry thoroughly. Occasional use of mineral oil will help maintain its appearance.
feature_bullets: Each piece is individually handcrafted and unique, and is footed for non slippage
Made from durable acacia wood with a beautiful, rich dark color that complements any kitchen décor - Hand wash only
Dimensions: 12"-15" diameter x 1 3/4" high (size will vary due to handcrafted nature of product)
Server is a contemporary item with rustic appeal and is great for serving cheese, crackers, and hors d'oeuvres
